trans-unit.source: A report that includes sign ins that have been identified as anomalous by our machine learning algorithms.
trans-unit.target: A report that includes sign ins that have been identified as anomalous by our machine learning algorithms.

trans-unit.source: Irregular Sign ins are those that have been identified by our machine learning algorithms, on the basis of an "impossible travel" condition combined with an anomalous sign in location and device.
trans-unit.target: Irregular Sign ins are those that have been identified by our machine learning algorithms, on the basis of an "impossible travel" condition combined with an anomalous sign in location and device.

trans-unit.source: This may indicate that a hacker has successfully signed in using this account.
trans-unit.target: This may indicate that a hacker has successfully signed in using this account.

trans-unit.source: We will send an email notification to the global admins if we encounter 10 or more anomalous sign in events within a span of 30 days or less.
trans-unit.target: We will send an email notification to the global admins if we encounter 10 or more anomalous sign in events within a span of 30 days or less.

trans-unit.source: Please be sure to include aad-alerts-noreply@mail.windowsazure.com in your safe senders list.
trans-unit.target: Please be sure to include aad-alerts-noreply@mail.windowsazure.com in your safe senders list.
